definition: writer of 詞|词[ci2] (a kind of Classical Chinese poem)/person of literary talent
old variant of 詞|词[ci2]
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
sb of literary abilities (idiom)

sentences.english: Ci writers often make use of the qualities of sounds to express emotions at the sight of some particular scenes or objects.
sentences.chinese: 词人往往运用词的声韵特点进行状景寄怀，托物寓情。

sentences.english: Li chingchao was the greatest poetess of China.
sentences.chinese: 李清照是中国最伟大的女词人。

sentences.english: The poet Zhang Xian in the Beisong Dynasty is famous for describing the simulacrum.
sentences.chinese: 北宋词人张先以善于写影而著称。

sentences.english: Jiangxi Ci-Poetry Community is one of most famous Ci-Poetry Communities between the beginning of Yuan Dynasty and the ending of Song Dynast.
sentences.chinese: 宋末元初江西词人群体是一个非常著名的词人群体。

sentences.english: Jiangxi Ci-Poetry Community is one of most famous Ci-Poetry Communities between the beginning of Yuan Dynasty and the ending of Song Dynast.
sentences.chinese: 宋末元初江西词人群体是一个非常著名的词人群体。

sentences.english: And poets wanted to use the image of wide goose to realize their individuation.
sentences.chinese: 同时诗人和词人也力图用大雁意象实现诗词的个性化。

sentences.english: It is shown minute details the art achievement of the Tangsong Expert Ci by the angle of "Ciren's sentence construction".
sentences.chinese: 由“词人句法”的角度显微唐宋名家词的艺术成就。

sentences.english: Liu Yong was a very popular Ci writer who was full of autumn moods.
sentences.chinese: 柳永是一位有着深厚的悲秋情结的词人。

sentences.english: The feature of being flowery and delicately composed was the artistic pursuit of all these Ci writers.
sentences.chinese: 富艳精工是历朝应制词人的艺术追求。

sentences.english: After the perishing of the Song Dynasty, the intension of group feature had a qualitative change.
sentences.chinese: 国亡之后，词人群体特征的内涵发生了质变。

sentences.english: Kuang Zhouyi was an excellent writer and theoretician of Ci in Late Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 况周颐是晚清重要词人和词学理论家。

sentences.english: Because he is a poet of independent.
sentences.chinese: 因为他是一个自成一家的词人。

sentences.english: Lu Bi-cheng was a famous female poet in the modern times of China.
sentences.chinese: 吕碧城是中国近现代一位杰出的女词人。

sentences.english: Fang Yue was the greatest with the highest achievements in Huizhou poetic altar of the Southern Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 方岳是南宋徽州词坛中词学成就最高的词人。

definition: Li Qingzhao (1084-c. 1151), southern Song female poet

bard/poet

women's love/passion (felt by lady)
Li Yu (c. 937-978), given name of the final ruler of Tang of the Five Southern dynasties Li Houzhu 李後主|李后主, a renowned poet
Nalan Xingde (1655-1685), Manchu ethnic Qing dynasty poet

Su Shi (1037-1101), also known as Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡[Su1 Dong1 po1] northern Song Dynasty writer and calligrapher/one of the Three Su father and sons 三蘇|三苏[San1 Su1] and one of the Eight Giants of Tang and Song Prose 唐宋八大家[Tang2 Song4 Ba1 Da4 jia1]
scholar/literati
Ma Zhiyuan (c. 1250-1321), Yuan dynasty dramatist in the 雜劇|杂剧[za2 ju4] tradition of musical comedy, one of the Four Great Yuan Dramatists 元曲四大家[Yuan2 qu3 Si4 Da4 jia1]
Yuan Haowen (1190-1257), famous poet Northern China during the Jin-Yuan transition
